subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Nick Johnson was taught by his father, a celebrated leaper, to cultivate the all-around abilities that took his uncle, Dennis Johnson, to the N.B.A. Hall of Fame.
snippet: Nick Johnson was taught by his father, a celebrated leaper, to cultivate the all-around abilities that took his uncle, Dennis Johnson, to the N.B.A. Hall of Fame.
